name: Mercury-T
description:
Mercury-T calculates the evolution of semi-major axis, eccentricity, inclination, rotation period and obliquity of the planets as well as the rotation period evolution of the host body; it is based on the N-body code Mercury (Chambers 1999, ascl:1201.008).
Published in "Mercury-T: A new code to study tidally evolving multi-planet systems. Applications to Kepler-62", 2015, Astronomy & Astrophysics, Volume 583, id.A116, 15 pp.
